Articles.Content:
I have not seen many challenges relating to the cash system in this game. As you can see all of the parts have a cost but there is no actual use for it. Because of this I thought a challenge would be nice. In this challenge you are tasked with creating a new world and spending your entire $500,000 on anything you want. You can build Mun bases, space stations, rockets, and other creations with your cash. Here are the rules:

___________________________________________________________________________________________________

1. STOCK ONLY

2. NO MECHJEB

3. NO KETHANE

4. NO MODS

5. NO CHEATING THE GAME IN ANY OTHER WAY

6. YOU MUST MAKE A POST ON THIS THREAD WHEN YOU HAVE FINISHED SPENDING

7. THE ONLY PARTS YOU NEED TO COUNT ARE THE ONES THAT EXIST IN YOUR END SAVE (Not including destroyed parts)

8. YOU MUST INCLUDE A FULL BUDGET FOR ALL PARTS AND ROCKETS IN YOUR POST

9. YOU MUST INCLUDE A DOWNLOAD TO YOUR SAVE FILE IN YOUR POST

10. BEST SAVE WINS

___________________________________________________________________________________________________

If you think the rule about not including destroyed parts is funky think of it as me buying your space program. I would not

want to pay for the parts that you had already destroyed. Put a price on it and have fun!!!
Rookery, please see the challenge submission guidelines and rewrite your challenge, it's too confusing/unclear at this time
